name: Frostfall: The Goblerkin's Feast
description: A band of adventurers must navigate a treacherous frosted forest and unravel the mysteries of the goblerkin before a blizzard traps them forever.
synopsis: Deep in the heart of the frostbitten forest of Glacialveil, the players stumble upon a peculiar settlement where a secretive clan of turkey-people, the Goblerkin, have built a fortified hut from stolen armor and enchanted feathers. The players must navigate treacherous terrain, battle frost giants and magical turkey-men, and uncover the truth behind the disappearances of local hunters. Along the way, they'll deal with the Goblerkin's unpredictable hospitality and the looming threat of a blizzard that could trap them forever. The campaign culminates in a desperate battle against the Goblerkin's matriarch, who seeks to expand her domain and ensnare the party in her eternal feast.
plotHooks: Local hunters have gone missing in the Glacialveil forest, and the PCs are hired to investigate.
A mysterious blizzard is approaching, and the PCs must seek shelter in the Goblerkin's hut.
A wealthy patron offers a reward for the return of stolen armor and artifacts from the Goblerkin.
The PCs discover a map leading to a hidden treasure trove within the Goblerkin's fortress.
A prophecy foretells of a great feast that will either save or doom the northern lands.

scenes.name: The Frozen Forest
scenes.description: The party enters the Glacialveil forest, a treacherous landscape of ice and snow. They must navigate the harsh environment and avoid the dangers lurking within.

scenes.name: The Goblerkin's Hut
scenes.description: The party arrives at the Goblerkin's fortified hut, a bizarre structure made of stolen armor and enchanted feathers. They must navigate the complex social dynamics of the Goblerkin and uncover the truth behind the disappearances.

scenes.name: The Frozen Lake
scenes.description: The party must cross a treacherous frozen lake to escape the Goblerkin or reach Gorm the Frost Giant's lair. The lake is home to ice wyrms and other dangers.

scenes.name: The Escape
scenes.description: The party must escape the Glacialveil forest before the blizzard traps them forever. They must navigate the treacherous terrain and avoid the dangers that stalk the forest.

scenes.name: The Aftermath
scenes.description: The party returns to civilization, where they must deal with the consequences of their actions and the truth behind the disappearances.

majorNPCs.name: Magda the Matriarch
majorNPCs.background: Formerly a revered healer, Magda was cast out for her unorthodox methods and now leads the Goblerkin with a mix of benevolence and malice.
majorNPCs.personality: Charismatic but manipulative, Magda speaks in riddles and offers cryptic advice, always with a smile that doesn't reach her eyes.
majorNPCs.motivation: To create an everlasting feast where all are welcome, whether as guests or as the main course.
majorNPCs.appearance: A towering figure with feathery wings, a beak-like nose, and a cloak made of stolen fur. Her eyes glow with an unnatural light.
quirks: Always carries a silver goblet filled with a mysterious liquid.
Humming an old lullaby when plotting her next move.
Feigning ignorance when confronted with her dark deeds.
secrets: She is not a true Goblerkin but a shapeshifted fey entity.
The disappearances of hunters are part of her plan to expand her feast.
She is slowly succumbing to a curse that will turn her into a mindless turkey-beast.
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A regal yet eerie turkey-woman with a glowing gaze, adorned in stolen furs and feathers, holding a silver goblet.

majorNPCs.name: Barnaby the Betrayer
majorNPCs.background: A former hunter who turned to theft and deception to survive the harsh winters.
majorNPCs.personality: Sarcastic and self-serving, Barnaby has a soft spot for the underdog but will betray anyone for the right price.
majorNPCs.motivation: To amass enough wealth to escape the Glacialveil forest forever.
majorNPCs.appearance: A wiry man with a scar across his face, dressed in patchwork armor and a tattered cloak.
quirks: Always counts his coins before making a deal.
Has a habit of pretending to be injured to gain sympathy.
Carries a lucky rabbit's foot that he insists is magic.
secrets: He was the one who tipped off the Goblerkin about the missing hunters.
He knows the location of a hidden treasure trove but refuses to share it.
He is secretly in love with a Goblerkin named Clucklow.
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A wiry, scarred man in patchwork armor, eyeing a pile of coins with a sly grin.

majorNPCs.name: Clucklow the Cautious
majorNPCs.background: A young Goblerkin who questions the traditions of her people and seeks a better way.
majorNPCs.personality: Kind-hearted but timid, Clucklow is torn between her loyalty to her clan and her desire to protect the outsiders.
majorNPCs.motivation: To find a way to end the cycle of violence and hunger that plagues her people.
majorNPCs.appearance: A petite Goblerkin with downy feathers and large, expressive eyes. She wears a cloak made of woven leaves.
quirks: Constantly fidgets with her feathers when nervous.
Offers food to any creature she meets, even insects.
Whispers apologies to the animals she hunts.
secrets: She knows the truth about the disappearances but is afraid to speak up.
She has been secretly meeting with Barnaby, hoping to broker peace.
She possesses a ancient artifact that could break Magda's curse.
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A small, downy-feathered Goblerkin with large, worried eyes, clutching a woven leaf cloak.

majorNPCs.name: Gorm the Frost Giant
majorNPCs.personality: Arrogant and brutish, Gorm sees the Goblerkin as pests and the PCs as potential sacrifices to the winter gods.
majorNPCs.motivation: To claim the Glacialveil forest as his territory and drive out the Goblerkin.
majorNPCs.appearance: A hulking figure with blue-tinged skin and a mane of icy hair. He wields a massive club made of frost-forged iron.
quirks: Laughs at his own jokes, even when no one else does.
Carries a trophy of Goblerkin feathers as a symbol of his prowess.
Has a superstition about the number three and avoids it at all costs.
secrets: He is actually a coward who only fights when he has the advantage.
He is secretly allied with the Goblerkin's rivals, the Ice Wyrms.
He has a hidden stash of stolen treasure buried in the forest.
majorNPCs.imagePrompt: A hulking frost giant with icy hair and a frost-forged club, adorned with Goblerkin feathers.
